title: New geometric typefaces that I've missed?
content:
Are there any new geometric typefaces out there besides the obvious always beautiful Gotham that I should look into? I am especially looking for one with a bit of character in a couple the glyphs like found in this thread [http://typophile.com/node/36930](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023045501/http:/typophile.com/node/36930 "http://typophile.com/node/36930")

 [‹ Reading makes you cross-eyed...](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023045501/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36952 "Go to previous forum topic") [Apostrophic humour ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023045501/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36875 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Endre Berentzen

comments.content: The large x height shown in Gotham is something I am looking for. Any other suggestions?
